title: Robert-Jan Bruintjes

content: This is my custom text about this paper.
title: The name of the paper

summary: We present the first edition of "VIPriors: Visual Inductive Priors for Data-Efficient Deep Learning" challenges. We offer four data-impaired challenges to encourage data efficient solutions.
title: VIPriors 1: Visual Inductive Priors for Data-Efficient Deep Learning Challenges

summary: We add line priors through a trainable Hough transform block into a deep network.
title: Deep Hough-Transform Line Priors

summary: We show we can prevent CNNs from exploiting absolute location through image boundary effects.
title: On Translation Invariance in CNNs: Convolutional Layers Can Exploit Absolute Spatial Location

content: We provide various courses on computer vision at both the undergraduate and the graduate level. Specifically, we teach courses on Image Processing (B.Sc. level), Computer Vision (M.Sc. level) and Deep Learning (M.Sc. level). In addition, we supervise students at all levels in fundamental and applied research projects, several of which are performed in collaboration with Dutch companies.

title: Education

content:
Interested in joining us at the Computer Vision lab? Check to see if we have any open vacancies on the TU Delft website.
Vacancies
Internships
We provide the opportunity to join the tab temporarily through internships for PhD candidates from other labs. Contact us through the contact form on the homepage.
Thesis supervision
Please see our page on thesis supervision.

title: Join us

content:
For students
We have many more students than staff members and thus we cannot guarantee that we can supervise you on any of these topics. Thus, before you contact the company, make sure you have a TU Delft supervisor.
Get in touch
For companies
Please provide a PDF with the project including scientific research questions. The PDF will be posted here, and thus advertised to potential students. We cannot guarantee that students respond to the project; we can also not guarantee that someone from the computer vision lab can supervise.
Submit proposal
